00010 #ifndef CUPP_device_H
00011 #define CUPP_device_H
00012 
00013 #include "exception/no_device_ex.h"
00014 #include "exception/no_supporting_device_ex.h"
00015 #include "exception/cuda_runtime_ex.h"
00016 
00017 #include "memory1d.h"
00018 
00019 #include <cstddef>
00020 #include <string>
00021 #include <cuda_runtime.h>
00022 
00023 namespace cupp {
00024 
00035 class device {
00036         public: /***  CONSTRUCTORS & DESTRUCTORS ***/
00040                 explicit device() {
00041                         real_constructor(-1, -1, "Device Emulation");
00042                 }
00043 
00048                 explicit device (const int major) {
00049                         real_constructor(major, -1, 0);
00050                 }
00051                 
00057                 explicit device (const int major, const int minor) {
00058                         real_constructor(major, minor, 0);
00059                 }
00060 
00061         private:
00068                 void real_constructor(const int major, const int minor, const char* name) {
00069                         // check if there is already a device
00070                         int cur_device;
00071                         if (cudaGetDevice(&cur_device)== cudaSuccess) {
00072                                 cudaSetDevice(cur_device);
00073                                 return;
00074                         }
00075                         
00076                         const int device_count = device::number_of_devices();
00077 
00078                         if (device_count == 0) {
00079                                 throw no_device_ex();
00080                         }
00081                         
00082                         int dev;
00083                         for (dev = 0; dev < device_count; ++dev) {
00084                                 cudaDeviceProp device_prop;
00085                                 cudaGetDeviceProperties(&device_prop, dev);
00086                                 bool take_it = false;
00087 
00088                                 //check major rev number
00089                                 if (name!=0) {
00090                                         if (std::string(name)==std::string(device_prop.name)) {
00091                                                 take_it=true;
00092                                         } else {
00093                                                 take_it=false;
00094                                         }
00095                                 }
00096                                 
00097                                 //check major rev number
00098                                 if (major!=-1) {
00099                                         if (major==device_prop.major) {
00100                                                 take_it=true;
00101                                         } else {
00102                                                 take_it=false;
00103                                         }
00104                                 }
00105 
00106                                 //check minor rev number
00107                                 if (minor!=-1) {
00108                                         if (minor==device_prop.minor) {
00109                                                 take_it=true;
00110                                         } else {
00111                                                 take_it=false;
00112                                         }
00113                                 }
00114                                 
00115                                 if ( take_it ) {
00116                                         break;
00117                                 }
00118                         }
00119                         
00120                         if (dev == device_count) {
00121                                 throw no_supporting_device_ex();
00122                         }
00123                         
00124                         cudaSetDevice(dev);
00125                 }
00126 
00127         public: /***  1D-MEMORY FUNCTIONS  ***/
00133                 template<typename T>
00134                 memory1D<T> get_memory1D(std::size_t size) const {
00135                         T* devptr;
00136                         if (cudaMalloc((void**)&devptr, sizeof(T)*size) != cudaSuccess) {
00137                                 throw cuda_runtime_ex(cudaGetLastError());
00138                         }
00139 
00140                         return memory1D<T>(devptr, size);
00141                 }
00142 
00148                 template<typename T>
00149                 void free (const memory1D<T> &memory) const {
00150                         if (cudaFree(memory.pointer_) != cudaSuccess) {
00151                                 throw cuda_runtime_ex(cudaGetLastError());
00152                         }
00153                 }
00154 
00161                 template <typename T>
00162                 void copy_host_to_device(const T* src, const memory1D<T> &dest) {
00163                         if (cudaMemcpy(p.pointer_, dest, p.size_*sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice) != cudaSuccess) {
00164                                 throw cuda_runtime_ex(cudaGetLastError());
00165                         }
00166                 }
00167 
00174                 template <typename T>
00175                 void copy_device_to_host(const memory1D<T> &src, T* dest) {
00176                         if (cudaMemcpy(dest, src.pointer_, p.size_*sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost) != cudaSuccess) {
00177                                 throw cuda_runtime_ex(cudaGetLastError());
00178                         }
00179                 }
00180                 
00181         public: /*** UTILITY FUNCTIONS ***/
00185                 static const int number_of_devices() {
00186                         // set the device
00187                         int device_count;
00188                         cudaGetDeviceCount(&device_count);
00189 
00190                         if (device_count == 0) {
00191                                 throw no_device_ex();
00192                         }
00193 
00194                         return device_count;
00195                 }
00196 }; // class device

00198 } // namespace cupp
